00057 class HandlerFactory : public ConnectionHandlerFactory {
00058 
00059 public:
00060   HandlerFactory(Comm *comm, ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue, MasterPtr &master)
00061     : m_comm(comm), m_app_queue_ptr(app_queue), m_master_ptr(master) { }
00062 
00063   virtual void get_instance(DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) {
00064     dhp = new ServerConnectionHandler(m_comm, m_app_queue_ptr, m_master_ptr);
00065   }
00066 
00067 private:
00068   Comm                 *m_comm;
00069   ApplicationQueuePtr   m_app_queue_ptr;
00070   MasterPtr             m_master_ptr;
00071 };
00072 
00073 
00074 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00075   typedef Cons<HyperspaceMasterPolicy, DefaultServerPolicy> AppPolicy;
00076 
00077   try {
00078     init_with_policy<AppPolicy>(argc, argv);
00079 
00080     Comm *comm = Comm::instance();
00081     ConnectionManagerPtr conn_mgr = new ConnectionManager(comm);
00082     ServerKeepaliveHandlerPtr keepalive_handler;
00083     ApplicationQueuePtr app_queue_ptr;
00084     MasterPtr master = new Master(conn_mgr, properties,
00085                                   keepalive_handler, app_queue_ptr);
00086     uint16_t port = get_i16("port");
00087     InetAddr local_addr(INADDR_ANY, port);
00088     ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr hf(new HandlerFactory(comm, app_queue_ptr,
00089                                                       master));
00090     comm->listen(local_addr, hf);
00091 
00092     DispatchHandlerPtr dhp(keepalive_handler.get());
00093     // give hyperspace message higher priority if possible
00094     comm->create_datagram_receive_socket(&local_addr, 0x10, dhp);
00095 
00096     app_queue_ptr->join();
00097   }
00098   catch (Exception &e) {
00099     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00100     return 1;
00101   }
00102   return 0;
00103 }
